title: Dangerous Toys [FANEDIT]
description:
What is this about? "Demonic Toys" without the corny "Satanic" elements.
what kind of fanedit (true fanedit = TF, extended edition = EE, special
 collection & preservation = SP): TF

tagline: They want to play...WITH YOU!

original film name: Demonic Toys
new film name     : Dangerous Toys
film studio name  : Full Moon Entertainment
edit crew name    : Retro Horror Remix
Date Original Film Was Released : 1991
Date Edit Was Released		: Feb. 1st, 2008
Original Runtime		: 86 Minutes
New Runtime			: 45 Minutes
Amount of time Cut/Added 	: 41 Minutes.

Cuts removed/added/extended     : 

-The film opens with just Judith chasing the criminals into the factory. (No boyfriend visible.)
-All scenes with the little boys (her child & "The Devil") are removed. The toys are now possessed by the 
warehouse instead of "The Devil".
-Any scene involving rituals have been removed.
-Most over-the-top dialogue changed/removed.
-Ending changed.



Fanedit details: This is a FULL DVD! Includes the film, and trailer with a menu and music.

Your intention for this fanedit: To change the origin of the Toys and remove the painful-to-watch scenes
with the 10-year-olds who act really over the top.

Your way to achieve your intention: Removed all scenes with the kids, including ritual scenes that also
build up to them.

Hardware and software informationt: Vegas & DVD Architect

Additional Comment: More info & trailer at: w w w . f r e e w e b s . c o m / r e t r o h o r r o r r e m  i x /

Time needed for the edition: About 2 days

persons involved: 1

RETRO HORROR REMIX...we do it right, baby!
